verbose_text: Postovulatory aging precociously induces alterations in expression and epigenetic modifications of chromatin by ATRX and in histone pattern in MII oocytes that normally occur after fertilization, possibly contributing to disturbances in the oocyte-to-embryo transition (OET) and the zygotic gene activation (ZGA).
evidence: induces alterations in expression and epigenetic modifications of chromatin by ATRX and in histone
